title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7612.9 - Inventory/storage of clothing, bedding and linen
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7612.9 - Inventory/storage of clothing, bedding and linen

State Regulations
(a) The inventory of clothing, bedding and
linen shall exceed that required for the facility inmate population. (b) The department shall develop a written
policy and procedure for the accountability of prisoner clothing, bedding and
linen. (c) All items of clothing, bedding and linen stored within a facility shall be maintained in a safe, secure and sanitary manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7612.9

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter V
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
